      • testInlineXMLCopyIntegrity

        public void testInlineXMLCopyIntegrity()
                                throws Exception
        Tests for deterministic inline-XML content between generations. Addresses bug #1771136: inlineXML would increase in size between copy generations due to added whitespace.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testAuditDatastream

        public void testAuditDatastream()
                         throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testNullObjectProperties

        public void testNullObjectProperties()
        Tests the serializers/deserializers when faced with null object property values.

        Currently, this test assures that null iproperty values are handled consistently among serializers and deserializers. The expected behaviour is a bit un-intuitive, but represents the "status quo" that satisfies existing server code:

        CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, External properties
        Null value should be interpreted as null
        Label, OwnerId
        Null value should be interpreted as an empty string ("")
        State
        Null value should be interpreted as "Active"

      • testEmptyObjectProperties

        public void testEmptyObjectProperties()
        Tests the serializers/deserializers when faced with empty ("") object property values.

        Currently, this test assures that empty string property values are handled consistently among serializers and deserializers. The expected behaviour is as follows:

        Label, Ownerid, External properties
        Empty string value should be interpreted the empty string ("")
        State
        Empty string values should be interpreted as "Active"
